Class Main

java.lang.Object
Main
All Implemented Interfaces:
Application
public class Main extends Object implements Application
Main application class that implements the Application interface. This class is responsible for initializing and running the application, managing user input, and handling the main application loop.

    • main

      public static void main​(String[] args)
      Main method to start the application.
      Parameters:
      args - Command line arguments (not used).

    • initialize

      public void initialize()
      Initializes the application by setting up necessary components. This includes creating a new dictionary, document, spellchecker, and GUI, as well as acquiring the file name from the user.
      Specified by:
      initialize in interface Application

    • run

      public void run()
      Runs the main function loop of the application. Continuously checks for certain conditions to maintain the application's state.
      Specified by:
      run in interface Application
